mapper.select: select * from tbl_theater theater, tbl_area area where theater.area_code = area.area_code and theater.theater_state = 'Y' order by regexp_replace(area.area_code, '[0-9]'), to_number(regexp_replace(area.area_code, '[^0-9]'))

select * from tbl_theater theater, tbl_area area where theater.area_code = area.area_code and theater.theater_state = 'N' order by regexp_replace(area.area_code, '[0-9]'), to_number(regexp_replace(area.area_code, '[^0-9]'))
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_theater(theater_code, theater_name, area_code, theater_num, theater_address) values('TC' || seq_theater_num.nextval, #{theater_name}, #{area_code}, seq_theater_num.nextval, #{theater_address})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from(select rownum rnum, a.* from (select theater.theater_code, theater.theater_name, theater.area_code, theater.theater_address, area.area_name from tbl_theater theater, tbl_area area where theater.area_code = area.area_code and theater.theater_state = 'Y' order by area_code desc) a)
where area_code = #{area_code}

select count(*) from(select rownum rnum, a.* from (select theater.theater_code, theater.theater_name, theater.area_code, theater.theater_address, area.area_name from tbl_theater theater, tbl_area area where theater.area_code = area.area_code and theater.theater_state = 'N' order by area_code desc) a)
where area_code = #{area_code}
mapper.update: update tbl_theater set theater_state = 'N', theater_del_date = sysdate where theater_code = #{theater_code}
